desc: If you have any additional questions, please do not hesitate to contact us at signs@neonita.com or call us at +370 699 45755.

faq.q1: How can I order a custom designed sign for me/my business?
faq.a1: To order a custom-designed sign, please contact us at signs@neonita.com or call us at +370 699 45755. Our team will work with you to create a unique design that meets your needs.
faq.q2: What is the process after ordering looks like?
faq.a2: After placing your order, our professional glass blowers will begin crafting your custom sign. This process involves designing, shaping, and assembling the neon tubes to match your specifications. Once completed, your sign will undergo a quality check before being shipped to you.
faq.q3: When should I expect my order to be delivered?
faq.a3: You can expect your order to be delivered within 4-6 weeks from the date of purchase.
